docs.snippet: The CBS show had its best ratings since a 2008 segment with Barack and Michelle Obama — drawing two million more than its 2016 Trump interview.

headline.print_headline: Stormy Daniels Attracts 22 Million Viewers to ‘60 Minutes’
headline.main: Stormy Daniels Attracts 22 Million Viewers to ‘60 Minutes’

docs.snippet: Not since the immediate aftermath of Sept. 11, 2001, have key national security leaders so publicly raised the threat of armed confrontation if foreign adversaries do not meet America’s demands.

headline.print_headline: With Threat of Force, Trump’s Reshaped Team Wants the World to Bend
headline.main: ‘America First’ Bears a New Threat: Military Force

docs.snippet: The issue has been at the center of months of intrigue at the sprawling department charged with caring for the United States’ 20 million veterans.

headline.print_headline: V.A. Shake-Up Gives Rise to New Fears of Privatized Care
headline.main: Veterans Affairs Shake-Up Stirs New Fears of Privatized Care

docs.snippet: The Office of Management and Budget and the Treasury Department are at odds over the Treasury’s longtime independence in writing tax regulations.

headline.print_headline: Turf Battle  Over Who Interprets Tax Rules
headline.main: White House Turf Battle Threatens to Delay Tax Law Rollout

docs.snippet: The president announced late last week that he is trying again to keep many transgender people from being able to defend their country.

headline.main: Trump’s Heartless Transgender Military Ban Gets a Second Shot

docs.snippet: In the last year, Russian hackers have gone from infiltrating business networks of energy, water and nuclear plants to worming their way into control rooms.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Hacks Left Russia Able To Shut Utilities
headline.main: Cyberattacks Put Russian Fingers on the Switch at Power Plants, U.S. Says

docs.snippet: The president has lavished praise on Mohammed bin Salman, who has rapidly consolidated his position as Saudi Arabia’s heir apparent.

headline.print_headline: Saudi Prince’s Visit Deepens Trump’s Commitment to Heir Apparent
headline.main: Saudi Prince’s White House Visit Reinforces Trump’s Commitment to Heir Apparent

docs.snippet: The stakes are high, the secretary general said, but he suggested that United States plans to quit the Paris Agreement didn’t matter much.

headline.print_headline: Biggest Threat to Humanity? Climate Change, U.N. Chief Says
headline.main: Biggest Threat to Humanity? Climate Change, U.N. Chief Says

docs.snippet: South Korea says that the North is willing to talk about dismantling its atomic arsenal. What happened to the threat of nuclear war?

headline.main: Listen to ‘The Daily’: North Korea Reaches Out

docs.snippet: The Klamath have joined with other Native American tribes to oppose a gas pipeline they say would threaten the Klamath River.

headline.print_headline: The Next Standing Rock? A Pipeline Battle Looms in Oregon
headline.main: The Next Standing Rock? A Pipeline Battle Looms in Oregon
